Class NumberBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • Actor
      • Box
        • NumberBox

  • public class NumberBox
extends Box
    The NumberBox creates the numbers that display the Jackpot

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NumberBox(int givenValue, int givenNumValue)
      Creates the NumberBox with a given unit value and given number value

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addValue()
      Adds one to the number value of the NumberBox
      java.lang.String getImageSuffix()
      Used to determine which box number should be displayed for this NumberBox object.
      int getNumValue()
      Gets the unit value of the NumberBox
      int getValue()
      Gets the number value of the NumberBox
      void work()
      Adds to the number value of the NumberBox.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NumberBox

        public NumberBox(int givenValue,
         int givenNumValue)
        Creates the NumberBox with a given unit value and given number value
        Parameters:
        givenValue - the unit value of the NumberBox
        givenNumValue - the number value of the NumberBox

    • Method Detail

      • work

        public void work()
        Adds to the number value of the NumberBox. If the NumberBox has a number value greater than 10 the NumberBox with a higher unit value gets increased by one and the number value of the current NumberBox gets set to 0;

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Gets the number value of the NumberBox
        Returns:
        the number value of the NumberBox

      • getNumValue

        public int getNumValue()
        Gets the unit value of the NumberBox
        Returns:
        the unit value of the NumberBox

      • addValue

        public void addValue()
        Adds one to the number value of the NumberBox

      • getImageSuffix

        public java.lang.String getImageSuffix()
        Used to determine which box number should be displayed for this NumberBox object. Uses value.
        Returns:
        the image suffix for the gif representing this tile
